channel.title: ~a couple problems~~317~
channel.description:
~317~ WILL POST ANSWERS AFTER FOR ANY PEOPLE WHO HAVE THE SAME PROBLEMS
1) How to turn npc? I thought it was like -1 is south 1 is north but it didn't work? Would I edit this in autospawn.cfg?
HERE IS NPC CODE:
[code]spawn = 2263 3016 4829 0 3020 4833 2974 4825 1[/code]
2) Making it so custom items don't appear on bottom, and it doesn't say: ...dragon_claws item Dragon_claws when you pick them up. It gives you 2 ways to pick them up but the ... doesn't let you.
3) Fixing Barrage: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443530.msg3256767.html#new]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443530.msg3256767.html#new[/url]
4) Obelisk Teleports: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443458.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443458.0.html[/url]

item.title: ~a couple problems~~317~
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

kingtren:

Add your items to the Item.cfg Correctly As well as your itemhandler.java in the correct areas.

There is no way to put it in itemhandler.java. If there is I don’t know where to put it or the format of it.

Read full topic

item.title: ~a couple problems~~317~
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

~317~ WILL POST ANSWERS AFTER FOR ANY PEOPLE WHO HAVE THE SAME PROBLEMS

  1. How to turn npc? I thought it was like -1 is south 1 is north but it didn’t work? Would I edit this in autospawn.cfg?

HERE IS NPC CODE:

spawn = 2263	3016	4829	0	3020	4833	2974	4825	1

  1. Making it so custom items don’t appear on bottom, and it doesn’t say: …dragon_claws item Dragon_claws when you pick them up. It gives you 2 ways to pick them up but the … doesn’t let you.

  2. Fixing Barrage:
    http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443530.msg3256767.html#new

  3. Obelisk Teleports:
    http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443458.0.html
